result.arabic_text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُواْ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
result.translation: When it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you and what is behind you[12], so that you may be shown mercy[13].”
result.footnotes:
[12] Of what awaits you in this life and in the Hereafter, or of the sins of the past and the future.
 [13] But they ignored the warning.
